pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kokanade pāsāde sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:6.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:7.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:7.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:7.8: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:8.1: “Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:9.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
